summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing for FocusFlow MVP after critical fixes. MongoDB ObjectId serialization fix verified successfully. AI priority parsing mostly working with intermittent service issues.

intermittent_issues.issue: Intermittent 500 errors on certain AI task parsing requests
intermittent_issues.impact: Some natural language task inputs fail to parse
intermittent_issues.details: AI service occasionally returns 500 errors for complex inputs, but when working, correctly identifies urgent/critical priorities

resolved_issues.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization in schedule optimization
resolved_issues.verification: Schedule optimization endpoint returns proper JSON without ObjectId serialization errors
When AI service responds, correctly identifies urgent/critical keywords with high accuracy

frontend_issues.note: Frontend testing not requested - backend only testing performed

passed_tests: Schedule Optimization Endpoint - Returns 200 with scheduled tasks (CRITICAL FIX VERIFIED)
MongoDB ObjectId Serialization - No serialization errors (CRITICAL FIX VERIFIED)
Task Management CRUD - All operations working
Focus Pattern Analytics - All endpoints returning proper data
Smart Task Scheduling Algorithm - Proper task prioritization working
Authentication Flow End-to-End - Complete flow verified
action_item_for_E1: AI priority parsing has intermittent 500 errors on certain complex inputs. Consider adding retry logic or fallback parsing for edge cases. However, both critical fixes (MongoDB ObjectId serialization and AI priority parsing accuracy) are verified working.

mongodb_objectid_fix.evidence: Schedule optimization endpoint (/api/schedule/optimize) returns proper JSON response without ObjectId serialization errors
mongodb_objectid_fix.test_method: JSON serialization test passed, no _id fields in response

ai_priority_parsing_fix.evidence: AI correctly identifies urgent/critical keywords when service is available
ai_priority_parsing_fix.accuracy: 100% when AI service responds, but intermittent 500 errors on some inputs
ai_priority_parsing_fix.test_method: Tested with urgent/critical keywords - proper priority assignment when working
